Text: InterestMr Nemec My name is Sherry Taylor I am working with one of the largest national law firms in recruiting an experienced energy associate This opportunity is based in the Houston office The focus of this opportunity is regulatory matters both upstream FERC and transportationrelated matters and downstream issues productionside regulatory matters including exploration issues and joint operating agreement issues I would like to give you more specifics I am unsure of the best way to contact you If you would be open to discuss just let me know the best time and contact number Sherry Taylor or Thanks Sherry
